plot: Veterinarians Kay Foster and Susan Darling set out to solve the mystery of an uncontrollable virus that is attacking their horses, despite love getting in the way.
title: Katie Fforde: Sprung ins Glück
plot_es: Veterinarians Kay Foster and Susan Darling set out to solve the mystery of an uncontrollable virus that is attacking their horses, despite love getting in the way.
plot_en: Veterinarians Kay Foster and Susan Darling set out to solve the mystery of an uncontrollable virus that is attacking their horses, despite love getting in the way.
